# NotifyDictionaryChangedAction enumeration

Classification of changes to a [`ObservableDictionary`](./ObservableDictionary-2.md) instance.

```csharp
public enum NotifyDictionaryChangedAction
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Add | `0` | items were added to the dictionary |
| Remove | `1` | items were removed from the dictionary |
| Reset | `2` | dictionary was reset. |
